name: Court, Connect, Capture
description:
Noble Connections, Ignoble Intentions


The king has summoned you! Recent reports indicate that there's a spy amongst the court magicians. You are the only noble qualified to join them without alerting suspicion so it's left to you to investigate.


Your parents are upset that you, future head of your noble family, do not have a spouse. They demand descendants and, fortunately for them, you're about to meet some high status peers.


Off you go to the join the Court Magicians to capture a spy and a spouse (or more than one)!

The court has a spy, connect disparate conversations, and capture them for the king.




Pay attention to the details.

Court magicians, connect with them through conversation, and capture their hearts.


Talk to the Court Magicians.



Make connections...


Capture hearts.


Or get rejections.

Some people are harder to court than others as their personalities and circumstances will vary.

Your Own Story



Every play through is unique with:
  • Different characters featuring their own appearance, personalities, and histories.
  • A variety of events move the plot forward.
  • Multiple endings from romantic to tragic.

Features

  • One conversation mechanic that simultaneously supports romantic interactions and thrilling deductions!
  • Uniquely generated plotlines and a scoring system add replay value.
  • Play the way that you want:
    Be romantic and find your one-true-love.
    Focus only on the investigation if you don't care to flirt.
    Marry all of your suitors (maybe avoid bad actors).
